Key Match Events: Manny Machado threw a ball towards the Dodgers dugout, which angered Dodgers manager Dave Roberts.
Pre-Game Insights: Dave Roberts said it was 'bothersome' and 'unsettling' that Machado seemed to throw a ball at him.
Roberts stated that Machado's throw was very disrespectful and the ball didn't hit him due to netting.
Dodgers sent video of Machado throwing the ball to MLB.
Flaherty wished he had 'held it together a little bit better' and acknowledged the emotional nature of the playoffs.
Post-Match Reflections: Roberts emphasized the need to keep things on the field and focus on the game.
Roberts used the incident as motivation for his team, stating that they would use it as fuel to win the game and series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans in the crowd threw items onto the field during the game, causing a delay.
Profar trolled fans by staring at them and hopping up and down before throwing the ball to the infield after robbing Mookie Betts of a home run.
